data.title: Volcano Princess Wiki
data.text:
In Volcano Country, a season lasts a whole year. In total, there are 42 turns and 4 seasonal years. Wood raises Rose from age 5 to 18, but there is a time-skip after Spring from 5 to 12.

Spring (1st year) only lasts 6 months unlike the 12 months of other seasons.

Outside of the house there is a note hanging above the key and picture of Luca. The note changes each season. Tap on it for CG collection purposes.

The newspaper updates every two months starting from January and provides info about Volcano Country or the residents. It can be skipped without downsides.

In the beginning of the game, you will gain data-sort-value="300"> 300G(not entirely true, more testing needed) monthly until Summer March (Turn 34) where you work jobs for gold instead.

Monthly Changes

Rose's Admirer count will increase if she is wearing dresses with +Admirer bonus.

New Admirer Letters will show up every month.

Rose's Fame will go up from being a certain relationship level with characters.

Any horses kept in the Stable will produce items.

Rose's height will slowly go up depending on stats.

Characters that can be invited to Explore will passively become stronger and level in the background regardless of Rose Exploring.

Recurring Events

Month Event February Height Evaluation March and April Central Plaza Shops 20% Discount June Birdie Festival July and August Bathhouse Salary x2 September Traveling Merchant, School Dance October Volcano Festival November and December Costume Ball at Banquet

Birthdays

Characters have special dialogue for being gifted an item on their birthday but it does not automatically give extra favor.

It's impossible to give characters a birthday gift in June and October due to the Festivals preventing you from using the map.

January February March April May June July August September October November December None

Read it as turn 42 = 42 turns left until coming of age ceremony.

Spring Volcano Year

Daughter's Age: 5-6 (age can start at 6 if birthday is set to January)

Season's Note: Bird picture

There is no birthday event in Spring for father or daughter.

For info on naming Rose and choosing her birthday see Rose's Profile. Talking to some npc's will engage in an Attribute Check mini-duel, it goes by Wood's stats instead of Rose's so it might be impossible to lose.

If extremely lucky it's possible to obtain Grape Seeds from Shiny Spots in Spring, which are otherwse only obtained from reaching Cooking Level Lv.5 or rarely +2 from planting one Grape Seed. Grapes obtained can't be used until you unlock the Grape recipes at Lv.5 however.

There are items exclusive to Sping that are very easy to miss:

Two unique 2-star sketches from Wild Horse Lake.

3 Books from Story Corner (2 are Favors for: Lebsa and Mona)

4 Books from the Father Style rewards (2 are Favored by Kenneth)

Turn 42 January

Events Daughter New Activity 3 Father Quests - Completion rewards random Picture Book

Finish 3 courses with Rose (daughter)

Eat at Family Restaurant 3 times

Talk with townspeople 10 times

Safe (Kind + Intel)

Proud (Kind + Brave)

Doting (Kind + Gentle)

Event:

Papa respects your secret (4 Kind + 12 Gentle)

Every warrior has their unique treasure chest (15 Brave)

I need to look under the bed (4 Lame)

Summer Volcano Year

Daughter's Age: 12-14

Season's Note: Painting of feeding birds with father

Daughter Birthday Event:

Want to be richer (data-sort-value="300"> +300G)

Want to be healthier (Stamina +2)

Want to be kinder (Charisma +2)

Want a lover (Favor +8 with random character, excluding Basilou, Claire and Jermaine)

Want more friends (All attributes +1 and Favor +1 with all characters) ? 50% per character to add +1, excluding Basilou, Claire and Jermaine?

Father Birthday Event: Doll

Shiny Spots in Summer are the only way of obtaining Insect items (for item collection). The most valuable one can be sold for data-sort-value="139"> 139G.

Turn 36 January

Events Unlock New Activity Changed activity Birthday Missing (Forced) Forgotten Valley - Explore Oasis Forest

School Opening Ceremony - Choose Knight Path Lord

Handel Family - Lord Lebsa

Focus: Stamina, Combat, Exploration, Duels, Back Alley, Equipment

Royal Family - Princess Gwyneth

Focus: Charisma, Art, Banquet, Theatre, Bathhouse Job, Relationships

Brain Family - Lord Claude

Focus: Mind, Alchemy, Debate, Horse Racing, Catching Horses (listed as "hunting prey")

Note: You cannot change the Lord after Turn 36. Your choice determines what Knight Path Tasks you will get, which Lord will be available in your playthrough to befriend and romance, and there are some Romance Endings etc tied to each Lord. It's only possibly to get the Volcano Queen Career Ending if choosing Gwyneth.

WARNING: there is a bug where the first time you try this, it will crash your game.

The activity will work fine after the initial crash.

It's recommended to trigger this as first thing you do in a turn so you don't lose progress later.

Horse Racing 5 AP (next, every even turn)

The Racing activity switches between Pageant and Race every month.

Winter Volcano Year

Daughter's Age: 16-18

Season's Note: Painting of building snowman with father

Daughter Birthday Event: Birthday cake

Father Birthday Event: Scarf with appearance based on the animal question in turn 17

Shiny Spots in Winter are a great source of Ice. With 2 Ice and 2 Snow Flowers you can make Snow Smoothies (Lv.2 Cooking) which give +1 Stamina or +5 Favor if gifted to anyone.

Carlos starts to sell potions that reduce your stats (to have more control over your stats for lower tier endings). They also give -1 if gifted to any character except Lon (he loves any potions).

Only one of each type can be bought per turn so if you need several, buying from him on different turns is necessary. Keep in mind you can't buy from him in June and October.

Turn 12 January

Changed activity Unlock Birthday Missing

Bookcase: Read INT +30 -6 AP

Story Corner: Poetry EMO +30 -3 AP

Easel: Sketch IMG +40 -6 AP

Lakeside: Hockey STR +30 -6 AP

Carlos' Potion Store at Abandoned Harbor

Dark Alley progress reset and can be entered again if cleared previously. It also has new enemies. Only up to 25 Enemies can be fought until you reach the end and are locked out.

Turn 2 November

Events Birthday Missing Costume Ball at Banquet

Last Father's Job Reward

Lords Top 3 Event

Guaranteed a Portrait of Benson if painting people at Wild Horse Lake.

If True End requirements are met, Lebsa will invite you on an exploration.

Her offer needs to be accepted to proceed with the True End.

A special Lebsa ending is only available through this route, if Lebsa is chosen as Lord and being romanced.

By choosing the

Punish

option when it comes up.

Triggering said ending will lock you out of all other Romance endings, even if you increase someone's Favor over Lebsa's after.

Turn 1 December

Traveling Merchant

The trader (Ippo) will come to player's house at the start of every September (if you have at least data-sort-value="1000"> 1,000G) to offer some special wares. The Equipment and Costumes can only be obtained from her. There are 3 encounters in total: on turn 28, 16, and 4. Only Magic Fruit is restocked between visits, the rest remainds sold out if bought previously.

[Can't wear till Winter year] data-sort-value="4000"> 4,000G A grass skirt with the mysterious power to make people feel warm when wearing it, even in the middle of winter.... That's the power of goblins! - Designer: Ippo

Random Item Merchant

Appearances Map Sprite Date Turn Location Summer May Turn 32 Abandoned Harbor Summer September Turn 28 Abandoned Harbor Fall January Turn 24 Abandoned Harbor Fall August Turn 17 Central Plaza Fall December Turn 13 Central Plaza Winter April Turn 9 Family Restaurant Winter May Turn 8 Abandoned Harbor

When talked to, the Merchant offers to sell one random item at a discounted price. They sell things for roughly half of their actual price (except Forbidden Fruit for less than half) and you can only buy one.

Reloading the turn will change the item offered by the Merchant. They appear 7 times over the course of the game.

Notes:

The Merchant has dialogue for Summer January, implying they were supposed to be accessible 8 times in total. However, the Harbor map is locked until Februrary.

There is no downside to buying any item (except Sprint Potion) even if you don't need it, because it can be resold to the Weapon Shop for a small profit.

The most profitable items to resell are Lily Perfume (data-sort-value="399"> +399G), Forbidden Fruit (data-sort-value="377"> +377G) and Demon World's Clear Water (data-sort-value="355"> +355G)

The Perfumes you buy from here will be given to you as an item, unlike at the Costume Store. You can use them from your inventory, but do note that there is no confirmation box unlike other consumables, so they will be used immediately.

This is one of the few ways to obtain Lily Perfume,Rose Perfume and Daisy Perfume as items, the other ways being Bathhouse, Father's Brewer Job and Dancing Competition.

Lily Perfume is also Favored (+4) by Gwyneth.

The shop's inventory overlaps with Ippo's and the Costume/Weapon shop. The only item that you can't buy elsewhere in any form is Fire Lily.

Father's Jobs

Starting from Summer March (turn 34) Jobs become available for Wood. Choosing one is always mandatory.

The chosen Job is completed and a new one is chosen every 5 months (in March, July and November). 8 Jobs in total will be completed in a playthrough.

The last Job is completed on Winter November (Turn 2), after which no more Jobs can be chosen.

Choosing a Job

When choosing, four Jobs (one of each location type) will be listed at random with random loot from their item pool. Reloading the turn randomises the available Jobs.

After accepting a Job, a Wood icon will appear on the bottom left, while you're in the outside area of Home.

It will display the chosen Job and hovering over it will additionaly display when you will be paid. The reward itself is not visible however.

Job Completion

Completing a Job provides their Gold and item reward. The Job reward will be on the table outside of Home and will need to be obtained before you can do anything else.

Additionally, every completed Job will add +3 Love to Father Style Score.

Every Job also has two unique dialogue lines from Wood when accepting and completing it.

For Daisy Perfume the same applies as for the Random Item Merchant, the Perfume is given as an item and is a Consumable without confirmation box.

Gold Estimate

A total value between data-sort-value="1200"> 1,200G and data-sort-value="6400"> 6,400G can be obtained, and around data-sort-value="2400"> 2,400G being more likely due to data-sort-value="300"> 300G being the most common reward.

Wood's Job Lines Ancient Book Restoration Assistant Start If Rose knew I'm restoring ancient books, she would definitely think I'm super cool! Complete Huh... fortunately, there was nothing wrong with the work. Those ancient books are really expensive. Armorer Start It seems that this group of newly joined knights are very motivated. Is it less than six months since the last armor change? Complete If there were just a little more time, I could still make those armor more exquisite. However, the current level of armor protection is definitely sufficient. Army Chef Start As I am working as a cook in the Knights' Camp, everyone would prefer beef, right? Complete The guys in the Knights really love drinking. Fortunately, I am a well behaved father, so it's best to remind Rose to drink less alcohol. Baker Start I can buy the best flour again! Rose had mentioned it many times, actually. Complete As a baker, I learned many new designs of pastries overseas. Rose must be happy if I cooked a cake for her. Let me try it tomorrow. Barber Start I also want to take this opportunity to learn some trendy hairstyles. I'm not sure if there is a suitable hairstyle for Rose. Complete The hairdressing technique is indeed quite advanced. Should I have a new hairstyle? But I won't do it at my age. Maybe I'd better ask Rose later. Breeder Start It's not an easy job to take care of the horses. I have to brace myself up now. Complete Perhaps the next time I raise horses, I should call Rose together to see if there are any foals she likes. Brewers Start If my friends knew that I worked in a distillery, they would definitely envy me. Complete Well, the lady boss gave me some discount coupons after work. How to use it? I am not interesting in wine. Dormitory Keeper Start I won't let go of those who don't stay up at night. Complete The knights with strict discipline usually behave like this in private, and no one believes it when it comes to it. Haha, as expected, they are all young people. Florist Start It's a bit difficult to feed the flowers this season. Whether I need to dig some black soil by the Mustang Lake? Complete These precious flower seeds have finally been raised, and they will bloom beautifully in the next Spring Fire year... I'll call Rose to see it together at that time. Foreign Trade Merchant Start As a businessman from neighboring countries, I should know many interesting goods. Oh, If I see any novel things, I'll take one for Rose. Complete I really have the talent to become a salesman. If I had been in business when I was young, maybe I have already become a millionaire? Guards Start There shouldn't be any supernatural events at the altar at night. Oh, I'm so scared because I've heard too many ghost stories told by Rose. Complete The job of guarding is easier than imagined, after all, no one dares to cause trouble at the altar. Hoof Nailer Start How is the temper of this batch of horses? Complete Fortunately, the work of farrier was safe this time. The poserity of mustang is indeed different! Horse Masseur Start Horse massager...massage the horses, sound interesting. Complete This work is harder than expected. The muscles of horses often trained in jumping and running are hard as stones. You can't work if you have no hand strength. Horseman Start Just clean it when the horse is not in the house. I will have a lot of free time. Complete The personality of horse breeds is so different. It is an interesting experience when I recall it. Scribe Start When Rose was a child, I read her storybooks and made her recognize many words. Now it's quite useful. Complete Huh, I've been copying books every day for the past few months, and my hands have become a bit numb. However, I also brought back some discarded manuscripts to Rose, which should be helpful for her learning. Tanner Start It would be great if those tanned leather materials could be delivered as soon as possible. The weather won't clear up for too long recently. Complete The commissioned production of leather goods has finally been completed as scheduled. I hope the knights can treat my craft well this time.

Random Events

Random Events are triggered at the start of a turn. The game decides events by going down the list of Random Events starting from #0 (Ippo). If qualifying for several events, the one with lowest priority number will trigger first.

Reloading the same turn will give the same event, except for events with a % of triggering: they will be rolled again, so might not appear.

All of the "Blessing" events except "Friendship Spirit" also have a related Achievement.

All events except the 4 season specific ones, "Sick Horse" and "Ippo's Store" can only be seen once per playthrough. Getting the seasonal events more than once seems unlikely however, because of the limited timeframe.

The "Challenge Letter" event might be bugged as it does not have any effect. A similar event is also used for one of Lebsa's friendship events.

Shiny Spots

Sometimes a random shiny spot will be visible in any map except Home. News spots are generated every turn and up to four shiny spots can be active on a map.

Clicking a shiny spot will give something from one out of four loot pools. The chances depend on the season.

The Gold obtained from Loot A will always be in multiples of 5, so only values like 20, ending in 0 or 5.

Loot D has its own loot pools that are decided by the season.

In Summer the loot additionally depends on if you're in the Altar or not, likely because it's an indoor map.

For outside maps, Cicada is slightly more likely because it's in the loot list twice.

In Winter you can only get Gold or Ice.

Earthworm, Cicada, Deer Horned Aspen and Golden Caterpillar can only be obtained through Shiny Spots.

Getting Grape Seeds in Spring makes it possible to grow Grapes early, which are otherwise locked behing Lv.5 Cooking.
